meanings.definition: A person who claims to have a supernatural ability to perceive events in the future or beyond normal sensory contact.
meanings.sent1: Some clairvoyants say they can see things that others cannot.
meanings.sent2: The clairvoyants at the fair predicted the weather for the weekend.
meanings.sent3: The clairvoyants at the party were the center of attention with their predictions.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition was so sharp, it was as if she had clairvoyants guiding her.
meanings.sent5: The clairvoyants' visions painted a vivid picture of what was to come.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to clairvoyants or their purported abilities.
meanings.sent1: She had a clairvoyants' intuition about the upcoming events.
meanings.sent2: The clairvoyants' predictions were surprisingly accurate.
meanings.sent3: His clairvoyants' sense of humor made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The clairvoyants' insight into the situation was impressive.
meanings.sent5: The clairvoyants' abilities seemed almost magical to those around them.
